article.title: St. Louis U.S. Export Assistance Center Contact Information
article.summary: Contact the St. Louis U.S. Export Assistance Center.
article.content:
St. Louis

​

St. Louis U.S. Export Assistance Center

4300 Goodfellow Blvd.
Building 110, Suite 1100-A
St. Louis, MO 63120

Phone: 314-260-3780
Fax: 314-260-3792
Email:Office.StLouis@N0SPAM.trade.gov

St. Louis Staff

Cory Simek, USEAC Director

Phone: 314-260-3782
Fax: 314-260-3792
Email:Cory.Simek@N0SPAM.trade.gov

Margaret Gottlieb, International Trade Specialist

Phone: 314-260-3786
Fax: 314-260-3792
Email:Margaret.Gottlieb@N0SPAM.trade.gov

Industries:Air Conditioning/Refrigeration Eq., Automotive Parts/Services Eq., Construction Eq., Food Processing/Packaging Eq., Foods - Processed, Footwear, Franchising, General Consumer Goods, General Industrial Eq./Supplies, General Services, Hotel/Restaurant Eq., Medical Eq.

Diana Poli, International Trade Specialist

Phone: 314-260-3783
Fax: 314-260-3792
Email:Diana.Poli@N0SPAM.trade.gov

Industries:Apparel, Architectural/Constr./Engineering SVC, Automotive Parts/Services Eq., Biotechnology, Building Products, Computer Software, Computers/Peripherals, Consumer Electronics, Cosmetics/Toiletries, Defense Industry Eq., Drugs/Pharmaceuticals, Education/Training Services, Electronic Commerce, Electronic Components, Films/Videos, Financial Services, Food Processing/Packaging Eq., General Consumer Goods, General Industrial Eq./Supplies, General Science & Technology, Health Care Services, Information Services, Laboratory Scientific Instruments, Leasing Services, Machine Tools/Metalworking Eq., Medical

Kristi Wiggins, International Trade Specialist

Phone: 314-260-3787
Fax: 314-260-3792
Email:kristi.wiggins@N0SPAM.trade.gov

Industries:Agricultural Chemicals, Air Conditioning/Refrigeration Eq., Aircraft/Aircraft Parts, Airport/Ground Support Eq., Apparel, Architectural/Constr./Engineering SVC, Automotive Parts/Services Eq., Aviation Services, Biotechnology, Building Products, Chemical Production Machinery, Defense Industry Eq., Drugs/Pharmaceuticals, Food Processing/Packaging Eq., Foods - Processed, Furniture, Health Care Services, Industrial Chemicals, Iron/Steel, Machine Tools/Metalworking Eq., Materials Handling Machinery, Medical Eq., Packaging Eq., Pet Foods/Supp., Pleasure Boats/Accessories, Printing/Graphic Arts Eq., Pumps/Valves/Compressors, Sporting Goods/Recreational Eq.

Warren Anderson, International Trade Specialist

Phone: 314-260-3785
Fax: 314-260-3785
Email:warren.anderson@N0SPAM.trade.gov

Trade Information Center

1-800-USA-TRADE (1-800-872-8723). The Trade Information Center works in conjunction with your local office. For immediate export assistance or for answers to your technical questions on exporting, call M-F 8:30 ​am - 6:00 pm Eastern time.​
